msbt.message: Hey, you know what? I just realized that you never stopped by the other day! It's OK, I wasn't home anyway. Whew! We both flaked out and it worked out perfectly.
Oh, , you're gonna hate me for this, .I know we made plans, but something came up. I hate to do this, but can we reschedule?

Yooo, so about the appointment we made to see each otherI had amnesia! I have a doctor's note! My dog ate my homework!Alright, none of those things are true. I just flaked out.Let's try again sometime, OK? I promise I'll be a better friend.
